solution_line_template: Anderson adds {sprigs_of_mint_per_batch} * {green_tea_leaves_per_sprig} = <<{sprigs_of_mint_per_batch}*{green_tea_leaves_per_sprig}={green_tea_leaves_per_batch_old_mud}>>{green_tea_leaves_per_batch_old_mud} green tea leaves in every batch of mud.

They are half as effective in the new mud, so Anderson should ad {green_tea_leaves_per_batch_old_mud} * {multiplier_for_half_effectiveness} = <<{green_tea_leaves_per_batch_old_mud}*{multiplier_for_half_effectiveness}={green_tea_leaves_new_mud}>>{green_tea_leaves_new_mud} green tea leaves to get the same efficacy as before.
